elektrophon
modules articles about

package manager¶

install the [chocolatey][1] package manager

Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))

environment for basic development¶

python packages¶

  • SchemDraw Schemdraw is a Python package for producing high-quality electrical circuit schematic diagrams.
  • itikz Cell magic for PGF/TikZ-to-SVG rendering in Jupyter
  • librosa is a python package for music and audio analysis. It provides the building blocks necessary to create music information retrieval systems.

install livetex, imagemagick and pdf2svg

choco install livetex imagemagick pdf2svg

install the latex modules in the tex live shell install:

  • pgf
  • xkeyval
  • standalone

environment for stm32 development¶

web page¶

  • KiBot is a program which helps you to generate the fabrication and documentation files for your KiCad projects

other software¶

  • audacity Free, open source, cross-platform audio software

Bulma by Jeremy Thomas. The source code is licensed MIT.
